sentences.sContent: If they no longer do, that is because of the new vernaculars invented to cajole automatons into doing man’s bidding.
sentences.sContent_eng: If they no longer do, that is because of the new vernaculars invented to cajole automatons into doing man’s bidding.
sentences.sCn: 如果人们不再这样以为了，那是因为一些新的语言被发明了出来用于哄骗机器人，使之屈服于人类。

remMethod.val: caj ( = cage, 笼子) + ole → 把 (鸟) 诱入笼子 → 哄骗

trans.tranOther: to gradually persuade someone to do something by being nice to them, or making promises to them
